website_summaries.verdict: This all-in-one USB microphone produces amazing audio, and yet is still super easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Great USB mic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great USB microphone once I overcame setup. I had loads of problems initially, I couldn't record and the LED would be flashing red very fast. I tired various Mac and Windows computers and had them same problem on all of them. I almost gave up and arranged a return, however are a bit of googling I discovered it was just a case of the changing the monitoring frequency rate to 48KHz the same as the microphone and it works perfectly. So a fantastic usb mic that could have better instructions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHERE CAN I BUY YHE BOOM ARM ADAPTOR
customer_reviews.text: I do like the mic and playing around with it I find something new all the time, however I am 6ft5 and I normally have my mics on a boom arm as sitting on the desk is quite far from me mouth, all the reviews on YouTube that I have watched had an adaptor straight out the box. Something that mine did not have and now I’m really struggling to find the adaptor. Does anyone know where I can purchase this?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Buckby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome microphone
customer_reviews.text: Transformational. Really excellent quality. Everyone I was on zoom/teams/webex/gotomeetings with commented on the sudden quality increase. Also been using it for some corporate videos I had to voice. Much better than anything I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gailey

customer_reviews.title: Great for acoustic guitar
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good mic that I could just stick into my Mac and go, to record my classical guitar performances. This has not disappointed, and gives a very true idea of what I sound like. It is really solid and has a reliable feel. I would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Ruth Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect audio quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement microphone for podcasts I do. The audio quality on this is superb, and I like that it's all USB-based with no extra drivers to install. Works just as described, and the manual knobs and mute really make it so easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Better than blue
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Loads better than the blue snowball I used previously. The sound is amazing and being able to plug guitar in and record two channels at once is brilliant. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: andy marham

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I have read and seen a hundred review videos, articles and honestly i was expecting a better capture of the sound. The picture of the microphone in a table and someone playing and singing...its unreal. From that distance, almost doesnt capture properly the voice. Also im very disapointed that some boxes bring the adapter for a stand and some dont. Mine didnt. Obviously to make you get the shock mount. Sounds nice if you re very close.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good not going to lie, it's just good. Sometimes I would have to replug the cable because sound isn't coming through, but after a reconnect it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Donelan

customer_reviews.title: Better Performance
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would give me a better quality than I had for for virtual lecturing. This gives me everything I need + more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mic for money
customer_reviews.text: Best mic for the money. Got it really quick and if you know what you're doing, it's an excellent alternative to xlr mic and mixers
customer_reviews.author: kris baldwin

product_meta.title: G-Track Pro - Professional USB Microphone with Audio Interface, black
product_meta.description: Style Name:EssentialProfessional sounding recordings shouldn't require an advanced degree in engineering In your home studio or recording on the road G-Track Pro allows you to focus on your recording and less on the process G-Track Pro is a USB microphone with an instrument input and mixer for recording two independent audio channels at one time With the ability to capture your audio at 24-bit/96kHz your recordings will deliver extremely detailed high-resolution results With plug-and-play connectivity and a straightforward design G-Track Pro is the right choice for musicians podcasters or streamers
feature_bullets: All-in-one Professional USB microphone with audio interface Record your voice and instrument at the same time
The right mic Ideal for streaming gaming podcasting and recording music
At your fingers Front panel mixer with microphone level instrument level and headphone volume controls Selectable Mono or 2-Track recording modes and Direct Monitor On/Off
Built for the studio Dual 1None (25mm) condenser capsules with three selectable pick up patterns - Cardioid (unidirectional) bidirectional and omnidirectional
High Definition Audio 24-bit 96kHz resolution Plug-and-play no driver installation required
Connect 1/4None instrument input for connecting guitars or line level devices
Listen 1/8None stereo headphone output with level control for zero-latency monitoring
Built tough Die-cast zinc construction with heavy gauge mesh grille and integrated desktop base

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars501 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
